content.raw:
I'm testing using:

1. `roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch model_args:="_v4" hand_suffix:="_robotiq_hands"`
1. `rostopic pub /atlas/control_mode std_msgs/String -- "Manipulate"`

So far, it has been 8 minutes of real-time (2 minutes sim time) and Atlas is still stable. Could you try the above two commands to see if they work?
content.html:
I'm testing using:

  1. roslaunch drcsim_gazebo atlas.launch model_args:="_v4" hand_suffix:="_robotiq_hands"
  2. rostopic pub /atlas/control_mode std_msgs/String -- "Manipulate"

So far, it has been 8 minutes of real-time (2 minutes sim time) and Atlas is still stable. Could you try the above two commands to see if they work?
